sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns_columns
sub_fields.instructions:
If your trying to achieve an image - text column layout, please put the image first then the text column.

This will result in text - image, then image - text etc in a staggered layout. Also this way it will respond down to mobile devices nicely :)

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: columns_text_color
sub_fields.instructions: If your background is dark then select light text, and vice versa. If your background is light then select dark text.

sub_fields.label: Padding
sub_fields.name: columns_padding
sub_fields.instructions: If you have blocks up against each other, then you can remove the top/bottom to push them against each other to bring the layout together.

sub_fields.label: Span
sub_fields.name: link_blocks_span
sub_fields.instructions: How many columns shall this block span. 4 in total. Try to keep even numbers such as span 2, with 2 elements spanning 1 therefore always making a total span of 4.
